title: The loving enemy or A famous true history written orignally in the French tongue, by the most incomparable pen-man of this age, J. P. Camus B. of Belley. Made English by Maior Wright, as his recreation, during his imprisonment.
author: Camus, Jean-Pierre, 1584-1652.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Thomas Rooks, in Gresham Colledg, next the stairs, entering upon the Exchange, near Bishopsgate-street: who makes and sells the best ink for records,
